text: namut ovungē mahar oba san̆dahan kara, (vivāha karagena) tibī, ovunṭa ḷaṁ vīmaṭa perama talāk kīvē nam, kavurun ata vivāha bandhanaya tikhennēda, ohu (svāmipuruṣayā) nætahot æya (birin̆da) athæra dæmuvahot misa, oba (mahar vaśayen) san̆dahan kara tibū dæyen aḍak æta. ehet oba, (oba tuḷa) atahæra sahayōgaya dīma bhakti viśvāsayaṭa itāmat samīpa vannēya. ebævin oba tuḷa parōpakārī bhāvaya amataka kara nodamanu. niyata vaśayenma allāh oba karana dæya avadhānayen yutuva balanneku vaśayen siṭinnēya
